price: Wọ́n sì máa sọ (fún wọn) pé: “Ní òní, Àwa yóò gbàgbé yín (sínú Iná) gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ̀yin náà ṣe gbàgbé ìpàdé ọjọ́ yín (òní) yìí. Iná sì ni ibùgbé yín. Àti pé kò níí sí àwọn olùrànlọ́wọ́ fún yín.”
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīla al-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā wamawākumu al-nāru wamā lakum min nāṣirīna
